alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Humacao; Luquillo; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 7:06AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Ceiba, Fajardo, Humacao, Luquillo, Maunabo, Naguabo, Patillas and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 703 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to a line of thunderstorms moving inland from the local waters. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - As this line of thunderstorms spread across eastern Puerto Rico, expect additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Ceiba; Fajardo; Humacao; Luquillo; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; Yabucoa
